name: High-Speed Plug-In D
effect: While you have a Tamer in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.[Main] For the turn, 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon) and can't be blocked by your opponent's Digimon.
security_effect: [Security] ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.) Then, add this card to your hand.
